sentences.en: A criminal might receive twelve strokes of the birch.
A solitary birch was bending gracefully at the edge of the frame.
sentences.cn: 在框边上,一棵孤独的柳树妩媚地垂着.

sentences.en: After a lovely stretch running right along the edge of Lake Baikal we moved away from birch and pine tree territory into lusher pastures.
sentences.cn: 在沿着贝加尔湖的一段美妙行程之后，我们离开了桦树和松树的地域，进入了令人迷醉的大草原。

sentences.en: Birch trees sprouted from the rubble and grew into a dense young wood.
sentences.cn: 桦树从瓦砾中长出来，形成了一片茂密的新林。

sentences.en: Cyril Birch was born in Lancashire, England in 1925.
European birch with silvery white peeling bark and markedly drooping branches.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的一种桦树,有银白色脱落树皮和下垂的枝条.

sentences.en: He used a piece of birch to make a small boat.
sentences.cn: 他用一块桦木做一只小船.

sentences.en: His voice, cold and perfectly enunciated, switched them like a birch branch.
sentences.cn: 他的话口气冰冷,一字一板, 有如给了他们劈面一鞭.

sentences.en: In " The Spy, " for instance, Harvey Birch is never adequately linked with the other characters.
sentences.cn: 例如在 《 间谍 》 里, 哈维?伯奇和其他人物的关系始终不够明确.

sentences.en: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.cn: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.en: It was a rough part, all hanging stone , and heather , and bIt'scroys of birch wood.
sentences.cn: 这一带地势险恶, 尽是些悬崖 、 灌木和细长的桦树.

sentences.en: Should we bring back the birch as a punishment?
sentences.cn: 我们应该恢复用桦条抽打的体罚 吗 ?

sentences.en: The birch is still considered a protection against evil spirits by some people in northern Europe.
sentences.cn: 一些北欧人仍然认为白桦可以辟邪。

sentences.en: The Indians peeled the bark from birch trees to make canoes.
sentences.cn: 印地安人从桦树剥下树皮做独木舟.

sentences.en: They've got a wonderful birch in the back garden.
sentences.cn: 他们在后花园有一棵极好的桦树.

sentences.en: This also explains why some migrants from east Asia to northern Europe suddenly develop an allergic reaction to jackfruit once they have come into contact with birch pollen.
sentences.cn: 这也解释了为什么来自东亚的某些移民，到了北欧后，一旦接触到桦树花粉，会突然出现菠萝蜜过敏反应的现象。

sentences.en: We found that birch bark could serve as paper.
sentences.cn: 我们发现桦树皮可以作纸用.

words.tran_cn: 桦树的；桦木制的；桦木的

trans.tran_cn: 桦树，桦木，（鞭打用的）桦条
trans.tran_en: a tree with smooth  bark (=  outer covering  )  and thin branches, or the wood from this tree
